title: JP Language
body: How do I change the JP language to English? I'm currently in Japan right now and the ping is just too high for me to play on NA.

replies.body: Unfortunately, English is not a supported language on the JP server, and we don't recommend making any manual modifications in order to attempt a language change. I can't provide support for any modifications to the League files, but if you have any other questions, let me know.
